name: Novotel Berlin Mitte

reviews.text: We stayed here as a family and loved it. The room was large and clena with nice facilities. The breakfast was extensive and the bar/restaurant was reasonably priced.
reviews.title: Good service

reviews.text: Location is good with a U-bahn just 2 minutes walk (or three if the kids are slow).
reviews.title: Great value hotel for a short break

likes.disliked: — no great views from rear rooms

reviews.title: Excellent location and a comfortable hotel!
reviews.text: All in all we were very happy.

We spent a week in Berlin in October. Berlin is a fantastic town and this hotel is perfect to discover it. As many modern hotels, it is quite neutral, staff is more professional than friendly, but rooms and service are really good. And it is located just near Alexanderplatz and Ubahn Stadtmitte, which is closed to everything : museums, shops, restaurants usw ...
reviews.title: great hotel - whiffy bathroom

reviews.text: We recently stayed here for the Berlin Marathon - which was a lucky choice as it is actually on the course so I could watch the runners without fighting through the crowds.
reviews.title: Great hotel in a great city
Great Stay
reviews.text: This is a great hotel - spotlessly clean and very modern. The beds were exceptionally comfortable and bathroom has a big bath that you can relax in after a heavy day of shopping or walking.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As with other reviewers, I booked directly through the website which is definitely the best option as when we enquired about staying the following weekend, we discovered that the actual price was over double what we paid.
reviews.title: Superb Hotel in Excellent Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was very clean and modern. Location wise, the hotel is a little out of the way from the action (probably 10-15 minutes walk) but there is a metro station close by. I would stay there again given the value for money. Berlin was amazing and I would definitely recommend a walking tour.
reviews.title: Good nights sleep but of the beaten track

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I recently stayed for four nights at the Berlin Novotel Mitte. It was a very pleasant stay. The hotel is in a very good location with Alexanderplatz an easy walk away. There is a food market in the small mall at the rear of the block the hotel is on. The staff were competent, helpful, friendly, and professional. The room was okay but like many hotel rooms it could use a little updating. The breakfast was truly a value with a plentiful variety of meats, breads, eggs, cheeses, etc. If you are able to get a very good rate for a room here by taking advantage of pre-paying via the Accor site, I would recommend it. The pics of the room are a little dark but if you've seen one better than average Novotel, you've seen this one. Stay here if the price is right for you.
reviews.title: A Decent Hotel

reviews.text: The highlight of the breakfast table in this downtown hotel is a self serving machine for making e.g. maple sirup wafers. But you will find plenty of ham specialities, fruits, cakes too.
reviews.title: Spoil yourself with gaufrettes

reviews.text: Friendly, efficient welcome, large perfectly clean rooms, mine was decorated in brown, beige and red. Sauna and fitness center for working out in the basement. Only thjing I missed was a bathrobe.
reviews.title: Loved It

likes.liked: — Modern design, free internet on the lobby computers

reviews.text: Best feature is location: neighbouring hirstoric Nikolai Quarter, therefore in the sightseeing triangle between Potsdamer Platz, Unter den Linden and Alexanderplatz. The "between" makes some difference in (lower) rates, while the distance is still not more than 3 blocks to Alexanderplatz or 2 min. to U-Bahn station Spittelmarkt. Bus stop for 3 lines around the corner at a small neighbbourhood shopping center with food store, hairderesser and cosy greek restaurant with outdoor garden.
reviews.title: Bit out of the way

description: The Novotel Berlin Mitte is a 4 star hotel in the heart of Berlin, between Alexanderplatz and Potsdamer Platz and within walking distance of major attractions such as Museum Island, the Brandenburg Gate and the Reichstag. Guests on a business trip or holiday will find the highest level of comfort in our 238 rooms and seven modern meeting rooms. A restaurant serving refined Mediterranean cuisine, 24 hour room service, Wave Bar and spacious sauna and fitness area provide relaxation for body and soul.
